dogData.description: A large friendly dog known for their loyalty and intelligence. They are great with kids and make excellent service animals, thriving on love and attention from their owners.
dogData.careDescription: Golden Retrievers require regular exercise, grooming, and socialization. They thrive in homes with large yards and need to be active and mentally engaged to prevent boredom.

dogData.description: German Shepherds are highly intelligent, confident, and courageous dogs. They are often used in police and military work, but their affectionate nature makes them wonderful family pets as well.
dogData.careDescription: German Shepherds need daily exercise and mental stimulation. Regular grooming is essential, and they benefit from obedience training to channel their energy positively.

dogData.description: Beagles are small to medium-sized dogs with a friendly, curious nature. Known for their keen sense of smell and boundless energy, they make great companions for families and active individuals.
dogData.careDescription: Beagles need regular outdoor exercise and enjoy exploring. They should be kept on a leash during walks to avoid wandering due to their strong hunting instincts.

dogData.description: Chihuahuas are tiny dogs with huge personalities! Despite their small size, they are known for being bold, confident, and loyal, making them excellent companions for individuals and families alike.
dogData.careDescription: Chihuahuas require minimal exercise but do benefit from daily walks and some playtime. They are prone to cold weather, so keeping them warm and cozy is essential.
